news.title: American Airlines hires industry veteran to lead commercial team as profits trail rivals
news.summary: Mr. Pieper has worked at Delta, Alaska and most recently at the Oneworld alliance. He has worked for the U.S. Air Force, Air Canada, and the Air Canada Pension Plan.

news.title: NBA coach Chauncey Billups, player Terry Rozier arrested in gambling probes
news.summary: Terry Rozier, a 10-year NBA veteran, joined the Miami Heat in 2024 from the Charlotte Hornets. Rozier will play for the Heat after spending his first 10 years with the Hornets.

news.title: Quantum stocks surge on report Trump eyeing stakes in the group like Intel, rare earth companies
news.summary: The Trump administration is reportedly in talks with several quantum-computing firms about government taking equity stakes in exchange for funding. The talks are reportedly taking place in Washington, D.C.

news.title: Here's where the economy is starting to show 'K-shaped' bifurcation
news.summary: The Labor Department is scheduled to release a consumer price index report on Friday. The report was delayed by the government shutdown, which is now in its third week.

news.title: Defense giants Airbus, Thales and Leonardo announce space merger to rival Elon Musk’s Starlink
news.summary: The companies’ CEOs labelled the plans “a pivotal milestone for Europe’s space industry’’ The plans are expected to be completed by 2018.

news.title: Gold just stumbled. A JPMorgan strategist says the metal could double in value.
news.summary: JPMorgan believes gold will increasingly become an investor favored hedge against equities, to the tune of 110%. The bank says gold will be used as a hedge against stocks in the future.

news.title: Inflation is still rising, CPI likely to show — but maybe not fast enough to stop Fed rate cuts
news.summary: Inflation has been creeping higher from a postpandemic low of 2.3% earlier this year due in part to the highest U.S. tariffs in decades.

news.title: Quantum stocks are rising. Why they may be the Trump White House’s next investment.
news.summary: The U.S. government is reportedly considering quantum investments. The technology holds promise, but there have been practical roadblocks to its development.

news.title: Smaller is better for Honeywell, as profit outlook is raised ahead of Solstice spinoff
news.summary: Honeywell raised its profit outlook above Wall Street expectations, even when accounting for the separation of its advanced-materials business, slated for the end of October.

news.title: American Airlines lifts profit outlook as travelers flock to premium seats
news.summary: American Airlines’ stock was set to rise Thursday. Full-year profit outlook was raised, amid continued strong demand for premium-seating options.
